name: Glitch Dip
description:
The Rock-Star is struggling with his glitches, sinking “Deeper and Deeper” into his consciousness… 

First person shooter game.

Game by Vladimir Frolov (Volkolak), Vasiliy Fokin (Bassilij), Stepan Rogozin
